name: Astroshenanigans
description:
Defeat your opponent while destroying planets. Take the control of the universe.

Created with Unity in 46hrs at NAD's Creative Jam 11th edition 

Team:

  • Mathilde Beaudet - 3D Artist / Animator 
  • Amina Blackburn - Designer / Sound Designer
  • Rémi Desrosiers - Designer / Programmeur
  • Philippe Fontaine - Artiste 3D
  • Alexis Gallant-Vigneault - Designer / Programmeur
  • Denis Simard - Designer / 3D Artist
